attributes.action: Come clean about the way in which the government got cheap equity in Banks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is clear that Robert Peston of the BBC had information that was detrimental to the share values of HBOS and LLOYDS TSB. This allowed the government to buy equity in these banks at reduced rates. Investigate how this was acieved and where the information came from.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
